description: Four men are accused of downing the jet over Ukraine, but are absent from the Dutch court.
title: Flight MH17: Trial opens of four accused of murdering 298 over Ukraine
title_page: Flight MH17: Trial opens of four accused of murdering 298 over Ukraine - BBC News
maintext: Audio transcripts disclosed by the investigation team last year suggested rebels in eastern Ukraine had close contact with Russia at the time. The head of the self-styled Donetsk People's Republic was recorded a fortnight before the disaster saying he was "carrying out orders and protecting the interests of one and only one state, the Russian Federation".
